#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int a[10000];
long long int arr[10][4010];
long long int sumab(int a1){
	int t,x,m,temp,i,j;
	for(i=0;i<1000;i++)
		a[i]=0;
	a[0]=a1;
		m=1;
		temp=0;
		long long int s=0;
		arr[a1][0]=1;arr[a1][1]=a1;
		for(i=2;i<4001;i++){
			for(j=0;j<m;j++){
				x=a[j]*a1+temp;
				a[j]=x%10;
				temp=x/10;
			}
			while(temp){
				a[m++]=temp%10;
				temp/=10;
			}
			s=0;
		for(int ii=m-1;ii>=0;ii--){s+=a[ii];
			}
			arr[a1][i]=s;		
		}	
		return s;
			
}
int main(){
	int t,a1,b,s,x,m,temp,i,j;
	
	//preompute all the sums
for(i=0;i<=4000;i++)
	{
		arr[0][i]=0;arr[1][i]=1;
	}
	for(i=2;i<=9;i++){
		sumab(i);

	}
	cin>>t;
	for(int count=1;count<=t;count++){
		cin>>a1>>b;
		
		cout<<"Case "<<count<<": "<<arr[a1][b]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
